bio: There's nothing worse than a spoiler, but that doesn't stop Spoilerina from spilling the beans at the first opportunity.

soultimate.name: Finale Spoiler
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Attack by 25%, Defense by 175%, movement speed by 20% and Move Meter speed by 50% for 30 seconds.
soultimate.description: Recover all HP and all stats are greatly increased.

skill.effect: Increases effect of healing techniques by 30%.
skill.name: Twinkle Toes

name: Spoilerina
